title: tu_kang
author: tu_kang
content: WEBSITE - DOCS -   DISCORD - TELEGRAM - TWITTER - ANNBulletswap Finance is a revolutionary DeFi platform that can transform your experience in decentralized finance. With its advanced technology and ZKSync Era Technologies integration, you can enjoy lightning-fast transactions, enhanced security, and reduced fees. Join the DeFi revolution with Bulletswap Finance and unlock a world of new possibilities.BOUNTY POOL = 5000 USDCTwitter         30%Telegram     15%YouTube      20%Discord       15%Article         20%===========================================================● Bounty Campaign Dates: May 14 - June 13 lasts for 4 weeks.● Rewards will be distributed to participants  after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Daily stakes! Do tasks every day and make reports  every 3 days  (work should be done each day)● Rewards will be distributed to participants  after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the USDC address.● Join Bullet Swap on social media:- Telegram Channel- Telegram Group- Twitter- Discord- Instagram● You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign.Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chat : Bullet Swap Group, channel,and Twitter●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code:Proof of authentication:- Email:- USDC Address (Bep20/Erc20) address :- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS●  If a participant is found to be used ill-practice for any campaign. A participant will be disqualified.●  Participants using foul language/funds will be disqualified.●  If rules set out in these campaigns are not followed, the participants will not be rewarded accordingly and no negotiation will be entertained.●  Disqualified members will lose the entire coins earned and this is irrevocable.●  The disqualified member will not be informed. To review your status, please check the Status sheet.●  The coins will be distributed at the end of the bounty program.●  Submission of work must be provided via the submission form. It is mandatory and the only way for the work results in acceptance. Only submitted work in the submission form will be counted for stakes.●  You can keep your work post in this thread (optional) to ensure the bounty claims later along with all other details asked in the submission form (as proof of stakes).●  Submit the proof of authentication in the thread whatever campaign you are participating. It is a mandatory option.●  We will update the stakes [weekly].Rewards:Stakes will be paid depending on friends/followers (at the start of the campaign).100-300 Followers/Friends: 1 stake per week301-1000 Followers/Friends: 2 stakes per week1001-4000 Followers/Friends: 4 stakes per week4001-10000 Followers/Friends: 5 stakes per week10001+ Followers/Friends: 6 stakes per weekRules:1. Join Telegram group here : https://t.me/Bulletswap2. Each Participant should join the official Twitter: https://twitter.com/Bulletswap_DEX3. Minimum of 100 Follower only can join the Campaign4. Report should be 5 minimum Retweet and 1 Tweet with the #Bullets #Bulletswap #BulletsFinance $BLT5. Tweet must be at least 50 characters summarizing the project6. All report must be on time or else you will get 07. If you have no new postsfrom our official Twitter account, kindly make a short post about Dexgem and use all of our official hashtag.8. Your privacy settings must be set to public so that we can check your work.Fill the registration form Here * Make reports  every 3 days using this format  (work should be done each day):Code:● Twitter Report ●Day xx to day xxTweet link1:2:3:Retweet link:1:2:3:Rewards:● 1 comment = 1 stakes.● 20 stakes for setting name and avatar(one time stake)Name: Your name | Bulletswap Ambassador.Rules:● Join Telegram Group  Telegram Channel ● Make a maximum 2 comments per day● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT !● Write comments in a crypto related group, mentioning the Bullet SwapWrite comments on groups from this listContinue the comment of the previous person. Your commentshould flow into the dialogue and continue the person’s thought.Comment examples:- Did you hear about the Bullet Swap?- Is the BLT good for buying now??- Is the Bullet Swap powered by Zksyn era or its own blockchain?- guys, what do you think about the Bullet Swap?- Bullet Swap looks good now, it's not pumped yet!           etc...● It is forbidden to make meaningless and unconscious comments, spam. Comments like: Hi!, Hello!, Good project - will not be counted. Don't spam all comments in a row, don’t write  silly phrases! Spam and low quality will not be counted.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the Bounty Chat.● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted.How to join:Fill the registration form Here ● Make reports every 3 days using this format (work should be done each day):Code:● Telegram Report ●- Day xx to day xx- Username link: (Example: https://t.me/username)- Telegram comments:- Comment Link #1:- Comment Link #2:- Comment Link #3:- Comment Link #4:- Comment Link #5:..- Comment Link #6:Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Join the Bulletswap official Discord server 2. Write at least 5 constructive messages on Discord server 3. Take screenshot of your message and upload it on imgbb or other image host.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your screenshot links weekly.Fill the registration form Rewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:  1. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 50 claps would be taken note of.2. Poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality.3. Each participant can write 1 article only.4. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high-ranked blogs may be accepted.5. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Pre Sale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Articles should never be removed.7. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project,   project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.8. Please provide a Wallet address and enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!Fill the registration form Rewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Videos must have at least 200+ youtube views. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!Fill the registration form
